desktop.lead: Use your phone to draw on this screen. Visit drawmote.io on your mobile device and enter the following code to connect to this session.

mobile.controllingInfo: Move your phone and point it at the screen. Press the circle to click or draw. Interact with sliders by sliding up and down.

webRTC.label: WebRTC
webRTC.supported: Low latency connection between both devices.
webRTC.notSupported: Unfortunately your browser doesn't support WebRTC. This is required for a seamless experience.

webSocket.label: WebSocket
webSocket.supported: This is used as a fallback to WebRTC. Latency will be high and thus the experience not optimal.
webSocket.notSupported: Your browser doesn't support native WebSocket connections. If possible, fallback options will be used, but they have not been tested.

gyroscope.label: Gyroscope
gyroscope.supported: Device can be used to calculate point on desktop screen.
gyroscope.notSupported: No gyroscope could be detected. It might be possible to still use the app.

canvasFilter.supported: All brush options can be used.
canvasFilter.notSupported: Without this feature you won't be able to adjust the brush hardness.
